Flow.description: A flow to allow for creation of a Business record. Improves the entity formation process

formulas.description: Entity Tax Classification field value from the Account that the Opportunity(which triggered the flow) is associated with.
formulas.name: AccountEntityTaxClassification
BusinessTypeDecision
formulas.expression: IF( OR( {!AccountEntityTaxClassification}= "S Corporation" , AND( {!AccountEntityTaxClassification}= "C Corporation", {!S_Corp} = "Yes") ), "S Corporation" , IF ( AND ( {!AccountEntityTaxClassification}= "LLC" , {!S_Corp} = "Yes"), "LLC taxed as S-Corp", IF ( AND( {!AccountEntityTaxClassification} = "LLC", {!S_Corp}= "No"), "LLC", IF ( AND( {!AccountEntityTaxClassification} = "C Corporation", {!S_Corp}= "No"), "C Corporation", "") )) )

formulas.name: BusinessTypeForEdits
formulas.expression: IF( OR( {!AccountEntityTaxClassification}= "S Corporation" , AND( {!AccountEntityTaxClassification}= "C Corporation", {!S_corporation} = "Yes") ), "S Corporation" , IF ( AND ( {!AccountEntityTaxClassification}= "LLC" , {!S_corporation} = "Yes"), "LLC taxed as S-Corp", IF ( AND( {!AccountEntityTaxClassification} = "LLC", {!S_corporation}= "No"), "LLC", IF ( AND( {!AccountEntityTaxClassification} = "C Corporation", {!S_corporation}= "No"), "C Corporation", "") )) )

formulas.name: IsaSCorp
formulas.expression: IF( OR( ISPICKVAL({!varEditBusiness.Business_Type__c} , "S Corporation"), ISPICKVAL({!varEditBusiness.Business_Type__c} , "LLC taxed as S-Corp") ), "Yes", "No")

Flow.label: Opportunity - Entity Formation - Business

recordCreates.description: Create the new Business Record (Related to the account )

Business record successfully created!


Click Next to add all Owner Information for this Business. {!Brand_Style_Close}
